overlapping_libraries.suggestion: Consider standardizing on a single web framework

framework_consolidation.suggestion: Consider consolidating around asyncio + one async library

actions: Migrate all hardcoded secrets to environment variables
Implement configuration encryption for sensitive data
Standardize on pytest as primary testing framework
Consolidate duplicate code using AST-based analysis
Extract utility functions to shared modules
Optimize dependency tree and remove redundant libraries
Implement performance monitoring for extracted components

testing_strategy: Automated testing for all extracted components

success_probability: 85-90% with proper execution and adequate resources
